Request-root.sublime-snippet.description: Get the root URL for the application.

Request-url.sublime-snippet.description: Get the URL (no query string) for the request.

Request-fullUrl.sublime-snippet.description: Get the full URL for the request.

Request-fullUrlWithQuery.description: Get the full URL for the request with the added query string parameters.

Request-path.sublime-snippet.description: Get the current path info for the request.

Request-decodedPath.sublime-snippet.description: Get the current encoded path info for the request.

Request-segment.sublime-snippet.description: Get a segment from the URI (1 based index).

Request-segments.sublime-snippet.description: Get all of the segments for the request path.

Request-is.description: Determine if the current request URI matches a pattern.

Request-fullUrlIs.description: Determine if the current request URL and query string matches a pattern.

Request-ajax.sublime-snippet.description: Determine if the request is the result of an AJAX call.

Request-pjax.sublime-snippet.description: Determine if the request is the result of an PJAX call.

Request-secure.sublime-snippet.description: Determine if the request is over HTTPS.

Request-exists.sublime-snippet.description: Determine if the request contains a given input item key.

Request-has.sublime-snippet.description: Determine if the request contains a non-empty value for an input item.

Request-all.sublime-snippet.description: Get all of the input and files for the request.

Request-input.sublime-snippet.description: Retrieve an input item from the request.

Request-only.sublime-snippet.description: Get a subset of the items from the input data.

Request-except.sublime-snippet.description: Get all of the input except for a specified array of items.

Request-intersect.description: Intersect an array of items with the input data.

Request-query.sublime-snippet.description: Retrieve a query string item from the request.

Request-hasCookie.description: Determine if a cookie is set on the request.

Request-cookie.description: Retrieve a cookie from the request.

Request-allFiles.sublime-snippet.description: Get an array of all of the files on the request.

Request-file.sublime-snippet.description: Retrieve a file from the request.

Request-hasFile.sublime-snippet.description: Determine if the uploaded data contains a file.

Request-hasHeader.description: Determine if a header is set on the request.

Request-header.sublime-snippet.description: Retrieve a header from the request.

Request-server.description: Retrieve a server variable from the request.

Input-flashOnly.sublime-snippet.description: Flash only some Input to the Session

Input-flashExcept.sublime-snippet.description: Flash only some Input to the Session

Request-flush.description: Flush all of the old input from the session.

Request-merge.description: Merge new input into the current request's input array.

Request-replace.description: Replace the input for the current request.

Request-json.sublime-snippet.description: Determine if the request is sending JSON.

Request-isJson.description: Determine if the request is sending JSON.

Request-wantsJson.description: Determine if the current request is asking for JSON in return.

Request-accepts.description: Determines whether the current requests accepts a given content type.

Request-prefers.description: Return the most suitable content type from the given array based on content negotiation.

Request-acceptsJson.description: Determines whether a request accepts JSON.

Request-acceptsHtml.description: Determines whether a request accepts HTML.

Request-format.description: Get the data format expected in the response.

Request-bearerToken.description: Get the bearer token from the request headers.

Request-session.sublime-snippet.description: Get the session associated with the request.

Request-user.sublime-snippet.description: Get the user making the request.

Request-route.description: Get the route handling the request.

Request-fingerprint.sublime-snippet.description: Get a unique fingerprint for the request / route / IP address.

Request-toArray.description: Get all of the input and files for the request.

Request-offsetExists.description: Determine if the given offset exists.

Request-offsetSet.description: Set the value at the given offset.

Request-offsetUnset.description: Remove the value at the given offset.
